name: MyBuddy
tagline: A Student's Buddy (Android App) for everyday needs
body:
### Introduction
MyBuddy is a collection of quick references, formulae and small apps. (Including Periodic Table, Resistance Code Calculator, Equation Solver, Base Converter, etc.), specifically designed for students.

### Building MyBuddy
Open this repository in Eclipse with the ADT installed and then build it!
Android 2.1 or higher SDK required.

### In case you are interested
MyBuddy is still in its infant stages of development. If you find any issues in MyBuddy, please do report them. Or better still, fork MyBuddy on Github and start hacking on it. I'll be waiting for your pull request. :)

### Author
MyBuddy is made by @swapagarwal during the GDG Android App Hackathon at IIT Guwahati.

### Support or Contact
If you have a bug report or feature request then post it on the MyBuddy issues or mail me at swapnilagarwal1994@gmail.com and I will get back to you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
